title: Flight Simulator 2020   How to   Planning a flight using Airmate
description:
Planning a flight is one of the things you probably already did or maybe your have just started playing flight simulator and you are searching for a flight planning tool.

In this video we will look at Airmate which is a flight planning tool which is still under development. We will discuss how you can plan your flights but also look at the several options how to get more information from for example an airport.

If you want to use Airmate also, visit the site below and get started:
https://fly.airmate.aero/
